alert.note: Alert for Bosque (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 5:44PM CDT until June 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Bosque County in central Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 544 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Meridian State Park, or 13 miles northwest of Clifton, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clifton, Meridian, Meridian State Park, Morgan, Norse, Womack and Cayote. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
